planning.title: Planning
planning.description: We dive deep into your business, preferences, and goals, exploring your industry, target audience, and competitors. Together, we craft a strategic plan, gathering essential elements like logos and brand guidelines. Our straightforward approach ensures the seamless creation of high-quality websites that not only meet but exceed your expectations. Your success story starts here!

highlights.title: Zero Upfront Expense
highlights.description: Launch Your 5-Page Small Business Site at No Cost! For more extensive projects, we offer personalized pricing, factoring in scope, additional pages, and project duration.

highlights.title: Complete Ownership
highlights.description: Your domain, content, code, listings. Cancel anytime with no fees or hassle.

design.title: Design
design.description: In our design phase, we sculpt your website's future with wireframes, mockups, and prototypes. Watch your ideas bloom into a stunning reality - it's the exciting preview before the grand reveal. Let's craft your online masterpiece together!

highlights.title: Unlimited Revisions
highlights.description: We'll work together until you're thrilled with the result. You have the power to change anything, anytime.

highlights.title: Mobile-First Design
highlights.description: Your site will look great on any device. We'll ensure your site is responsive and mobile-friendly.

development.title: Development
development.description: In the development phase, we code, integrate features, and test functionalities, building your website from the ground up. Watch the progress unfold in real-time as all the pieces come together seamlessly. The developer will transform your vision into a fully functional reality, ensuring each line of code contributes to an exceptional online presence.

highlights.title: Custom Code
highlights.description: We'll build your site from scratch, ensuring it's fast, secure, and optimized for search engines.

highlights.title: Attain the Perfect 100
highlights.description: We can reach a Google Page Speed score of 100, significantly improving your search ranking.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: Once you're thrilled with the result, we finalize the journey by signing the contract and launching your website to the world. As we hit the launch button, your site goes live, becoming readily available for the world to explore. Congratulations - you're officially online!

highlights.title: Worry-Free Hosting
highlights.description: You won't be charged separately for hosting. It's already integrated into your monthly payment.

highlights.title: Continuous Assistance
highlights.description: Feel free to connect with us, 24/7. Your direct line to the developer ensures your website is consistently up and running smoothly.
